column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I was here in October
column2: right before the Chicago Marathon on a business trip
column3: accompanying my boyfriend. The ticket was priced right at $18
column4: and I think I spend 6 hours here. I was blown away by the vast and diverse collection of art and history in one location. There were some exhibits that were not yet in play
column5: but I was able to sneak a peek of some of the soon to be unveiled pieces in the Greek history section.
